article.title: MacAulay-Brown to Provide Information Technology and Intelligence Services
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: MacAulay-Brown Incorporated, Dayton, Ohio, is being awarded a $25,969,228 firm-fixed-price delivery order with estimated cost line items under General Services Administration multiple-award, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity alliant government-wide acquisition contract for information technology and intelligence services. Specialized Contracting, Headquarters Air Force Special Operations Command, Hurlburt Field, Florida, is the contracting activity.
